lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s surprise ban on 500 and 1,000 rupee bills, aimed at tax avoidance and money laundering, is making life difficult for the average Indian.

byline.original: By ELLEN BARRY and SUHASINI RAJ

headline.print_headline: Sudden Ban of Some Currency Agitates and Discomfits India
headline.main: Crowds Line Up at India’s Banks to Exchange Banned Rupee Notes

snippet: Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s surprise ban on 500 and 1,000 rupee bills, aimed at tax avoidance and money laundering, is making life difficult for the average Indian....
